title: Riot help! I can't use my account anymore!
body: Today, I downloaded the PBE client. However, now I cannot switch from PBE to NA. So now I can't use my usual account, since it's not compatible with the PBE servers! Please help. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, but that didn't help. I just want to play.

replies.body:
Hey TBT water,

The PBE client is different than the NA (live) client, which is why you needed to install a completely different client for PBE. 

When you installed, did you follow the instructions in the FAQ?

For Windows:

- Download the Windows PBE client here
- Open "PBE_Client_Shell.zip"
- Copy and paste the entire PBE folder anywhere on your PC  **except the directory you're using for your main League of Legends installation**. Hosting the PBE files and the main League of Legends files in the same directory has been reported to cause problems.
- Double click on "lol.launcher.exe" or "lol.launcher.admin.exe" to run the launcher and start patching.

When you installed the PBE client, did you install it in a different directory than your live (NA) client?

You're correct that your NA account isn't compatible with PBE and visa versa. You'll need to make [a PBE account](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup).
